review: I wanted this Apple TV to work with my IPad, so I could use with YouTube and Netflix. What is even better is that not only are Netflix and YouTube already on the Apple TV, there are many other program channels I can watch past episodes and documentaries from like History, and Smithsonian. Set up was very easy, just remember you do need to have a modem for it to draw internet access from (mine is wireless)  and you need a HDMI cable to connect the AppleTV to your TV, which can be purchased from amazon as well.
author: Ladibug21

review: by far the unsung hero of the Apple lineup. The Apple TV has turned in to a staple of my entertainment life. There are so many functions to list, a lot of people are excited about the movies and tv capabilities--I agree they are incredible.A standout feature is using this in an office -- if you have a meeting and need to do a presentation you can simply use air play and run it directly from your MacBook or your iPhone with Keynote. I find this a feature I am using daily at my office or at home when I want to take advantage of my larger TV screen.Overall you can't go wrong, if you use ANY other Apple products this has a home right there next to your TV. Stop reading and buy it
